main event: An observation of a white light that gradually faded out with the advent of daylight was reported on 3 January 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 30 minutes., The observation was conducted using Ground-Radar., The source of the observation included military and civilian entities., The light was described as possibly being a star or planet., The conclusion suggests the sighting was possibly astronomical.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
